descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][size=3][b]REQUIRES DAWNGUARD! 

ACE IS LOACATED AT RIVERWOOD![/b]
 
Ace is a lovable husky from Riverwood. Once you find him it will be hard to let him go. He will fight by your side right until the end.

He will be your very best friend. Look after him. And he will look after you. 

Most of the Husky's have been taken in by the Dawnguard, but Ace broke free and made his way to Riverwood where he has been awaiting the arrival of a traveler that is in need of a companion. 

If you spend a lot of time with Ace you'll feel like you have a strong bond with him. You'll know that he'll be there to fight your enemies. He'll be there when you just want to relax for a little bit. He'll be there forever. 

[b]Ace is essential so he cannot die. [/b]

Hope you enjoy this little mod, be sure to leave a comment and a thumbs up! Don't forget to share with your friends! 

Thanks for downloading! And don't forget to endorse if you enjoyed this mod!

Steam Workshop link: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=289758189

[/size][/font]Was uploaded on the Steam Workshop prior to this. It has 5 stars and 13,000 DLs, I decided to upload it here after people PM'd me.
author: iNoisyy
